description: This file is a Markdown document containing the README and documentation for integrating HTML/CSS/JS assets within a Flutter app using WebView. It explains how to add new screens, reference assets properly, and troubleshoot issues.

classes.name: HtmlScreenRoute
classes.description: A route class used to define a WebView screen linked to a specific HTML asset.

methods.name: WebViewWidget
methods.description: A widget that displays HTML content loaded from assets, using a baseUrl for relative reference resolution.
